mapper.select:
SELECT PAL_CD, PAL_NM, PAL_VAL_FR, PAL_VAL_TO, PAL_EAT_RMRK, REG_DT, REG_TM, REG_USER_ID, UPT_DT, UPT_TM, UPT_USER_ID FROM TI_PAL_STND WHERE 1 = 1
AND PAL_CD LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%',#{palCd},'%'))
AND PAL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{palNm},'%')
LIMIT ${rowCount} OFFSET ${currentIndex}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TI_PAL_STND ( PAL_CD, PAL_NM, PAL_VAL_FR, PAL_VAL_TO, PAL_EAT_RMRK, REG_DT, REG_TM, REG_USER_ID, UPT_DT, UPT_TM, UPT_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #{palCd} , #{palNm} , #{palValFr}::NUMERIC , #{palValTo}::NUMERIC , #{palEatRmrk} , TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') , TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'HH24MISS') , #{regUserId} , TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') , TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'HH24MISS') , #{uptUserId} )
mapper.select: SELECT PAL_CD FROM TI_PAL_STND WHERE 1=1 AND PAL_CD != #{palCd} AND (#{palValFr}::NUMERIC BETWEEN PAL_VAL_FR AND PAL_VAL_TO OR #{palValTo}::NUMERIC BETWEEN PAL_VAL_FR AND PAL_VAL_TO)
